Article Title: Watch: Vaibhav Suryavanshi smashes nine sixes vs England U-19; collects India U19 record during career-best score
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi hit nine sixes during his career-best knock for India U-19 vs England U-19 in third Youth ODI. (Image: X)

EXCLUSIVE | David Gower on Shubman Gill, Jasprit Bumrah and India's England tour

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Most sixes by Indian U-19 Batters in Youth ODI

9: Vaibhav Suryavanshi vs England, 2025

8: Raj Bawa vs Zimbabwe, 2022

8: Mandeep Singh vs Australia, 2009

7: Ankush Bains vs Zimbabwe, 2013

Fastest fifties by India U-19 batters in Youth ODI

18 balls – Rishabh Pant vs Nepal Under-19s, 2016

20 balls – Vaibhav Suryavanshi vs England Under-19s, 2025*

23 balls – Tilak Varma vs England Under-19s, 2023

24 balls – Vaibhav Suryavanshi vs Sri Lanka Under-19s, 2024

India U-19's Vaibhav Suryavanshi delivered a remarkable batting performance, scoring 86 runs off just 31 balls including nine sixes and six fours, leading his team to a four-wicket victory over England U-19 in the third Youth ODI on Wednesday. The 14-year-old left-handed batter achieved a 20-ball fifty, helping India chase down England's target of 269 runs in 34.3 overs in the rain-shortened 40-over match.Suryavanshi's explosive innings included the most sixes by an Indian batter in youth ODIs, surpassing the previous record of eight maximums jointly held by Raj Angad Bawa and Mandeep Singh.His 20-ball half-century stands as the second-fastest by an Indian in youth ODIs, only behind Rishabh Pant's 18-ball fifty against Nepal U19 in 2016.The young Rajasthan Royals batter demonstrated exceptional boundary-hitting abilities, with 78 of his 86 runs coming through fours and sixes. This accounted for 90.69 percent of his total score, placing him among only four Indians to achieve such a high percentage of runs in boundaries in a Youth ODI innings.England U-19, batting first in the rain-affected match, posted a competitive total of 268 for six wickets.Their captain Thomas Rew remained unbeaten on 76 off 44 deliveries, setting up a challenging target for the Indian team.Suryavanshi's performance in the series has been consistently impressive, as he currently leads the batting charts with 179 runs in three innings. His strike rate of 213.09 in the ongoing five-match ODI series demonstrates his aggressive batting approach.This innings marked Suryavanshi's highest score in his six youth ODIs for India, showcasing his development as a promising talent in Indian cricket's youth ranks. His aggressive batting style and ability to clear the boundaries consistently have made him a valuable asset for the India U19 team.
Article Summary: Vaibhav suryavanshi hit nine sixes during his career-best knock for india u-19 vs england u- 19 in third youth odi. The 14-year-old left-handed batter achieved a 20-ball fifty, helping india chase down england's target of 269 runs in 34.3 overs. His explosive innings included the most sixes by an indian batter in youth odis.

Article Title: "Don't want my meat on Page Six": Travis Kelce admits one major change in his life after falling for Taylor Swift
Article Text:
Travis Kelce says this one thing has changed drastically in his life (Getty Images)

Travis Kelce confesses the unexpected impact Taylor Swift had on his personal life



Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce is gearing up for his 13th NFL season, and it’s not just football that’s kept him in the spotlight. With over 12,000 receiving yards, 1,004 receptions, 77 touchdowns, and three Super Bowl titles to his name, Kelce’s Hall of Fame resume speaks for itself. But ever since going public with global pop icon Taylor Swift in 2023, his public visibility has shifted into a whole new realm.Despite being a fan favorite long before Taylor Swift entered the picture, Kelce admitted that the intensity of media attention since dating the Grammy-winning singer caught him off guard. Speaking candidly on the "Bussin' With The Boys" podcast, Travis Kelce reflected on the realities of being in such a high-profile relationship.“Yeah, it's just the paparazzi. That's probably the only thing I didn't grasp until you're in it,” Kelce admitted. “That's probably the craziest part. Like, I'm just playing golf and all of a sudden there’s a guy with a camera hiding in the trees. I’m like, ‘Oh no, I’ve gotta use the restroom now—I can’t just walk over there and do my thing.’”Kelce, known for his fun-loving and unfiltered personality, acknowledged that being with someone as globally recognized as Swift means constantly being watched.He quipped, “Never been ashamed of slamming beers, just don’t want my meat on Page Six.”While the attention has increased, Travis Kelce made it clear that at its core, their relationship is grounded in normalcy. “Yeah, we’re having fun with it, man. Just being a couple, dude — you already know,” he said, brushing off speculation that their public appearances are for show. “It gets thrown out there like we’re trying to seek attention every now and then, but we’re just enjoying life and having fun, going to hockey games… kind of easing her into more of the sports world. ”As Taylor Swift’s global reach introduces Kelce to fans far beyond the football field, he continues to focus on what he does best—dominate the gridiron. With Chiefs training camp just weeks away, the cameras won’t be going anywhere. Expect to see Swift back in her suite, cheering as Kelce chases a potential fourth Super Bowl ring.For Travis Kelce, the biggest transformation hasn’t been fame—it’s how fame now follows him off the field. But through it all, he and Swift seem unfazed by the noise. They’re simply two individuals, navigating laugh, love and life under the brightest spotlight imaginable, and doing it on their own terms.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld and Josh Allen’s wedding featured a surprise nod to the Buffalo Bills
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs star travis kelce is gearing up for his 13th nfl season. Kelce admitted that the intensity of media attention since dating the grammy-winning singer caught him off guard. “yeah, it's just the paparazzi. That's probably the only thing i didn't grasp until you're in it,” kelce said.

Article Title: “Their body language suggest something…”: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's subtle body language during NYC dinner hints at their true connection
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's recent Manhattan outing has sparked discussions about their relationship's potential (TheImageDirect.com)

Body language expert says Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are showing signs of lasting love

Over the weekend, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce lit up Manhattan with what many are calling the ultimate display of youthful, romantic energy. But it wasn’t just the cute outfits and dinner date that had fans talking—it was the way they moved, dressed, and interacted. According to body language expert Judi James, their coordinated style and subtle affection hint at something deeper than celebrity chemistry: the belief that they may have truly found “the one.”Popstar Taylor Swift looked radiant in a flirty pale pink mini dress with gold buttons, while Travis Kelce kept it sleek in cropped black trousers, white socks, loafers, and a crisp white shirt. While this might seem like standard celebrity datewear, Judi James sees it as far more intentional. “Taylor and Travis’s styling and their body language suggest something of a time-warp,” she noted, pointing to their classic prom-queen and king aesthetic.This wasn’t just a fashionable night out. Judi James observed that Kelce’s wardrobe choices are starting to mirror Swift’s romantic style. “Travis's short-cropped black pants and white socks suggest he's gradually and happily style-twinning with her,” she said.But it was his subtle movements that said even more. “Travis sucks his lips in at one point to show he's taking the date very seriously and his large paw of a hand encases Taylor's hand in a clasp of macho protection. ”From their body positioning— Kelce confidently leading while Swift walked demurely behind—to the way she held her small handbag close, everything about their presence suggested a couple relishing that new, enchanted stage of romance. “Taylor's body language epitomizes 'demure' here, with her head lowered, her elbows pulled into her waist and that dinky little bag held in one hand,” James added.Judi James believes this "first-date college look" may not be accidental. “It could be a desire to stoke the idyllic romantic side of their relationship or a mutual wish to present each other as 'The One', going back to a teen-date state to delete any high-profile and sometimes less than agreeable relationships they've each had with others in the past,” she explained.Also Read: Why Taylor Swift’s love life feels louder with Travis Kelce than it ever did with Joe Alwyn Swift has long built her brand on emotional storytelling, and this softer, sweeter public persona may be a reflection of a new, more intentional chapter. If their body language is anything to go by, both Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are not just enjoying the moment — they’re laying the groundwork for something much more enduring.
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce's recent manhattan outing has sparked discussions about their relationship's potential. Body language expert judi james says their coordinated style and subtle affection hint at something deeper than celebrity chemistry: the belief that they may have truly found "the one"

Article Title: Bryan Braman in critical condition as JJ Watt donates $10K amid rare cancer battle
Article Text:
JJ Watt donates $10K to help former Eagles Super Bowl champ Bryan Braman battle rare cancer. ( Thomas Campbell-USA TODAY Sports)

I’ve got your back.

Bryan Braman, the Eagles’ wild warrior is now fighting a much bigger battle



JJ Watt makes top GoFundMe donation to support cancer fight



“Donate to Bryan Braman’s Healing Journey”

The NFL community woke up to tears and goosebumps when news broke that JJ Watt, three-time Defensive Player of the Year and everyone's favorite good guy quietly donated $10K to help Bryan Braman in his battle against a life-threatening disease.The two go way back to their Houston Texans days, and even though their careers diverged, their bond clearly didn’t. Watt didn’t say much. He didn’t need to. His donation was the loudest message anyone could send:If you watched the Philadelphia Eagles’ 2017 Super Bowl run, you know Bryan Braman. He wasn’t the biggest name on the field, but he was one of the toughest, a fearless special teamer, hair flying, body flying even harder. Braman made his mark with grit, intensity, and pure energy.Now, years after hoisting the Lombardi Trophy, he’s in the toughest matchup of his life: a rare form of cancer that has landed him in critical condition. His body has already endured multiple surgeries, chemotherapy sessions, and now, a shot at CAR‑T cell therapy, a cutting-edge but expensive treatment that could give him a chance at survival.Braman’s family launched a GoFundMe campaign titledto help cover treatment, travel, and housing expenses as he undergoes a 12-week program in Seattle.Watt’s $10K is the highest donation so far, but every dollar is making a real impact.From $20 donations by fans to $1,000+ gifts from former teammates, the community is rallying in true football family fashion. The campaign notes just how rare and complex this type of cancer is making standard treatment nearly impossible without significant financial help.Bryan Braman’s always been a fighter. Whether it was scrapping to make an NFL roster as an undrafted free agent or charging down the field on special teams without a second thought, he’s never backed down from a challenge.And now, with the odds stacked against him, he’s fighting again. This time, for his life.But just like in football, he’s not alone. With legends like JJ Watt in his corner and thousands of fans cheering him on from across the country, Braman's got a real shot and a real team behind him.Also read - Travis Kelce says he “can’t really read that well” and panicked during SNL table read
Article Summary: Jj watt donates $10k to help former eagles super bowl champ bryan braman battle rare cancer. Braman’s family launched a gofundme campaign titledto help cover treatment, travel, and housing expenses as he undergoes a 12-week program in seattle. Watt's $10k is the highest donation so far, but every dollar is making a real impact.

Article Title: Tom Brady and Sydney Sweeney romance rumors take a turn as actress is reportedly "not interested in a relationship"
Article Text:
Tom Brady and Sydney Sweeney's age gap has sparked a dicussion.(Image via IMAGO/X)

Tom Brady and Sydney Sweeney’s rumoured romance faces a new turn as the two stars remain silent



Tom Brady’s divorce from Gisele Bündchen shocked his fans but the NFL legend has remained single, even three years after their divorce

Tom Brady, the NFL legend, turned heads at the lavish wedding of Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez, since, as per TMZ, he was spotted dancing with popular Hollywood actress, Sydney Sweeney . It has been a long time since Tom Brady has been spotted with any woman so fans were shocked at his rumoured romance with Sydney Sweeney and now there is an update on it.Recently, as per TMZ, a source has revealed that contrary to popular opinion, Sydney Sweeney is not looking for a boyfriend at the moment and “is not interested”.The popular Hollywood actress and the Euphoria star was in a long term relationship with her fiancé, popular producer, Jonathan Davino. The two met when Sydney Sweeney was pretty young but the two remained a power couple. However, the two broke up a few months ago and it seems like Sydney Sweeney is not looking for any relationships at the moment.However, neither Tom Brady nor Sydney Sweeney has reacted to the rumours of their alleged romance.Tom Brady's divorce from his ex wife, Gisele Bündchen, shocked his fans as the two seemed deeply in love and had already been together for more than a decade.While there have been rumours of romance between Tom Brady dating a few high profile stars in the last few years, such rumours have fizzled out in weeks as the NFL legend remains single.This is completely contrary to his ex wife, Gisele Bündchen's personal life as she moved on in her life just a few months after their divorce and has even started a new family.Recently, according to Radar Online, a source has revealed that, "Word's getting around that Tom's a whiny, flaky man diva and not much fun to be around. He whines about his ex and it just puts off any potential partners."Also Read: “She won’t be interested”: Tom Brady’s rumored fling with Sydney Sweeney sparks outrage among fans
Article Summary: Tom brady and sydney sweeney’s rumoured romance faces a new turn as the two stars remain silent. A source has revealed that contrary to popular opinion, sydney sweeney is not looking for a boyfriend at the moment and ‘is not interested’

Article Title: Patrick Bertoletti and Joey Chestnut: A Clash of Titans at Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest 2025
Article Text:
Image via Instagram/ Patrick Bertoletti

How Bertoletti’s competitive streak makes him the perfect candidate for this challenge



Joey Chestnut on 2025 Return to Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest

What is at stake for Bertoletti



A NEW CHAMPION 🌭 Patrick Bertoletti wins 2024 Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest 🏆

Patrick Bertoletti, the reigning champion of the Nathan’s Famous Fourth of July Hot Dog Eating Contest, is gearing up for a high-stakes title defense at Coney Island. After downing a personal best of 58 hot dogs last year to clinch the coveted Mustard Belt in Joey Chestnut’s absence, Bertoletti is now focused on pushing past the “60‑dog club. ” “I’ll be eating next to [Chestnut] and he’s crazy fast out of the gate. That’s just extra motivation and drive,” he tells TMZ Sports. With Chestnut—the long-time “Jaws” of competitive eating—making his comeback, what was a surprise championship could turn into one of the most intense rivalries in hot dog history.Bertoletti, 40, began competitive eating in 2007, earning the nickname “Deep Dish” through his record-breaking performances in events like chicken wings, cream-filled doughnuts, and peanut butter & jelly sandwiches. With that experience fueling his confidence, he’s embracing new pressure as the defending champ. “It does feel weird because […] I’m not used to being the champ…but it feels good,” he explains in the TMZ video.Bertoletti says the anxiety linked to the title isn’t negative—it’s energizing. With the goal of breaking the 60‑hot‑dog barrier, he’s strategically pushing his training. “The goal is to improve on 58…if I could get into the 60 club, […] but 60 would be great,” he states .He anticipates that Chestnut’s blistering pace will ground him in focus: “If you have somebody like that next to you pushing the pace, […] you’re just gonna be focusing on keeping up with him. ”Joey Chestnut, a 16‑time Nathan’s champion, was controversially barred from the 2024 contest due to a vegan sponsorship conflict but is set to return on July 4, 2025. With a staggering 76‑hot‑dog record in 2021 and an ambitious 80‑dog target this year, Chestnut’s comeback sets the stage for a showdown. His absence last year left fans and athletes like Bertoletti feeling the competition was incomplete. For Bertoletti, Chestnut’s presence is not just a challenge—it’s validation. “It didn’t feel right without him there,” he reflected.For Bertoletti, this year’s contest brings more than the title. Establishing himself in the “60‑dog club” would cement his status among the elite of the sport. Equally, it's a rare shot to beat Chestnut head‑to‑head—a victory that could redefine his career. The contest’s broader narrative—legendary return, underdog champion, historic milestone—is captivating audiences beyond typical food‐sport fans.Also read: Celebrities spotted at Wimbledon 2025: David Beckham, Nick Jonas, John Cena and more As Independence Day approaches and Coney Island prepares for its annual spectacle, the clash between Patrick Bertoletti and Joey Chestnut promises to deliver drama, records, and edge‑of‑seat competition. Bertoletti’s 58‑dog triumph was historic; a 60‑dog performance would be groundbreaking. Yet the spotlight now shifts to Chestnut, the unbeatable force eager to reclaim his throne. Whether a new era begins or the old guard reasserts dominance, this Fourth of July showdown stands poised to become one of the most memorable chapters in hot dog eating lore.
Article Summary: Patrick bertoletti, 40, is the reigning champion of the nathan’s famous fourth of july hot dog eating contest. Joey chestnut, a 16‑time nathan's champion, was controversially barred from the 2024 contest due to a vegan sponsorship conflict but is set to return on july 4, 2025.

Article Title: Diogo Jota Dies in Tragic Car Accident: Global Tributes Flood In
Article Text:
Image via Getty



The Tragic Accident the Claimed the Life of Diogo Jota

Jota Crash Cause: Moment Liverpool Star's Car Spun Across Road; Civil Guard Reveal What Happened

LeBron James’ Tribute to the Deceased Diogo Jota



The Impact of Jota’s Passing

Honoring Diogo Jota’s Legacy

The world of sports is in mourning following the tragic death of Diogo Jota, the 28-year-old Liverpool and Portugal forward, who died in a car accident in Spain alongside his younger brother, André Silva. The devastating incident has prompted an outpouring of grief from across the footballing and sporting communities, with tributes coming from teammates, rivals, and global icons—including NBA superstar and Liverpool FC part-owner LeBron James In the early hours of July 3, 2025, Diogo Jota and his 26-year-old brother André were traveling in a Lamborghini in the Spanish province of Zamora when the car’s tire blew out while overtaking another vehicle. The car veered off the road, caught fire, and both brothers were declared dead at the scene. No other vehicles were involved, and authorities are investigating the circumstances further.The tragedy struck less than two weeks after Jota’s wedding to his long-term partner, Rute Cardoso. The couple, high-school sweethearts, had three young children together. Jota’s last social media post was a video from his wedding day, captioned, “A day we will never forget”.LeBron James, who has been a part-owner of Liverpool FC through Fenway Sports Group since 2011, was among the first global sports figures to publicly honor Jota. On his official X account, James wrote: “My prayers goes out to his loved ones during this time! May you all be guided and protected! YNWA JOTA!! 🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾❤️”The acronym “YNWA”—“You’ll Never Walk Alone”—is the anthem of Liverpool FC and a message of solidarity, especially poignant in moments of loss. James’ tribute reflects his close connection to the club and its players, even if his personal relationship with Jota was not widely publicized. As a high-profile owner and ambassador, LeBron James’ words resonated deeply with Liverpool fans and the wider sports world.Jota’s death has left a profound mark on football. He was a key figure for Liverpool since joining from Wolverhampton Wanderers in 2020, scoring 65 goals in 182 appearances and helping the club secure the Premier League, FA Cup, and League Cup. Internationally, he earned 49 caps for Portugal and was part of the squad that won the UEFA Nations League.Tributes poured in from fellow athletes and public figures. Cristiano Ronaldo, Portugal’s football legend, wrote: “It doesn’t make sense. We were just together in the national team, and you had just gotten married. To your family, your wife and your children, I send my condolences and wish them all the strength in the world”.Liverpool FC expressed its devastation and requested privacy for Jota’s family, while fans gathered at Anfield to lay flowers, shirts, and scarves in his memory. The city of Liverpool flew its town hall flag at half-mast, and UEFA announced a minute’s silence before matches at the Women’s European Championship.Diogo Jota’s legacy will endure through the memories of his achievements on the pitch and the lives he touched off it. As LeBron James and countless others have shown, the global sports community stands together in honoring his memory, offering comfort to his family, teammates, and fans during this unimaginable loss.
Article Summary: Diogo jota, the 28-year-old portugal forward, died in a car accident in spain alongside his younger brother, andré silva. The tragedy struck less than two weeks after jota’s wedding to his long-term partner, rute cardoso. Lebron james, who has been a part-owner of liverpool fc since 2011, was among the first global sports figures to publicly honor jota.

Article Title: What is Tyrese Haliburton's usual diet plan? Indiana Pacers star knows how to balance taste and nutrition
Article Text:
Image credit: Tyrese Haliburton/Instagram

Tyrese Haliburton’s routine diet is as much about flavor as fitness



Tyrese Haliburton doesn’t experiment with his pre-game food



Tyrese Haliburton is just 25 and knows that he can treat himself to sushi or a hamburger once in a while. However, the Indiana Pacers star knows when to limit their frequency and gives credit for his well-balanced diet to his chefs. A die-hard pasta lover, he enjoys it for dinner, but when it comes to game day, he sticks to a fixed menu he doesn’t tamper with at all. Here’s all about the diet that helps him maintain his A-game on the court.Since his second year in the NBA, Tyrese Haliburton has employed chefs, as he is not very proficient in cooking and would often end up eating at restaurants in their absence. “It’s just important that I have someone holding me accountable, but it’s also me eating the right things,” he told GQ in a 2023 interview.The No. 0 point guard believes in an early and hearty breakfast. He loves a big plate of French toast combined with eggs and bacon, topped with his permanent fixture — a smoothie.He prefers a comparatively lighter lunch, which could be a grilled cheese sandwich or something else, complemented with tomato soup.He likes to keep his favorite food, that is pasta, for dinner, which he complements with rolls and a Caesar salad — and, of course, a smoothie.He prefers to end his night with a shake made with ice cream and protein or have a cherry juice from his own brand, Cheribundi. He claims it helps him fall asleep easily.Haliburton isn’t fond of vegetables, but he consumes them in the form of green juices. He’s fond of smoothies, which he has with every meal.Haliburton has kept his pre-game food palette fixed for a long time and never experiments with it, since it works well for him. It’s always chicken, rice, and bread with a green juice for lunch before he hits the court for a game. After a game, the first thing he takes is cherry juice.Tyrese Haliburton is currently recovering from surgery for a torn Achilles tendon. He led the Indiana Pacers to the NBA Finals, but his injury worsened during Game 7, which they unfortunately lost to the Oklahoma City Thunder. He fell to the floor in pain and had to be escorted out mid-game.Also Read: “How soft are the NBA players now?”: Tyrese Haliburton’s injury in Game 7 sparks heated debate among fans Now in recovery mode — which is expected to last several months — the player will definitely be savoring his favorite pasta and hamburgers, as he has a long time before returning to the court.
Article Summary: Tyrese haliburton is the no. 0 point guard for the indiana pacers. The 25-year-old is currently recovering from surgery for a torn achilles tendon. In an interview with gq, he revealed his pre-game food palette.

Article Title: Carolina Hurricanes at last land Nikolaj Ehlers with six-year, $51 million contract to power up scoring
Article Text:
Photo credit: © Charles LeClaire-USA TODAY Sports

Carolina Hurricanes sign Nikolaj Ehlers to pivotal six-year, $51 million contract aimed at strengthening their offensive lineup

Nikolaj Ehlers brings proven scoring and speed to the Carolina Hurricanes lineup

The Carolina Hurricanes have landed one of the top NHL free agents, inking Nikolaj Ehlers to a six-year, $51 million deal. The 29-year-old winger was the most sought-after player remaining on the market when free agency began. A speedster with a scoring ability and always-reliable offense, Ehlers provides Carolina with a big addition as it seeks to maintain its status as one of the Eastern Conference's top teams next season.Nikolaj Ehlers' contract has an average value of $8.5 million per year and represents Carolina's commitment to bringing scoring punch to the team. The Danish winger comes from a 2024-25 season with the Winnipeg Jets where he accumulated 24 goals and 53 points in 69 games. He also contributed five goals and seven points during Winnipeg's postseason run before the Jets were ousted by the Dallas Stars in the second round.Hurricanes GM Eric Tulsky confirmed that negotiations with Ehlers' camp heated up over the last several days, leading to Thursday's signing. The Hurricanes had plenty of cap space, but their ability to make a long-term commitment without having to give up other core pieces of the roster helps to illustrate the significance of the deal.Ehlers will be part of an offense that also includes Sebastian Aho and Andrei Svechnikov, providing another scoring threat.Selected ninth overall by Winnipeg in 2014, Ehlers has recorded 225 goals and 520 points through 674 career games in the NHL. His production history made him a hot commodity once free agency commenced. Prior to this new contract, he was completing a seven-year, $42 million deal with a $6 million cap hit.The Hurricanes have been busy this offseason, signing not just Ehlers but also signing young forward Logan Stankoven to an eight-year, $48 million contract extension. Carolina also traded for New York Rangers defenseman K'Andre Miller, showing a clear emphasis on constructing a team that can contend long term.Now with the addition of Nikolaj Ehlers, the Carolina Hurricanes have fulfilled their requirement for increased scoring depth and bolstered an already skilled roster further. The transaction is a testament to their insistence on remaining competitive and in pursuit of a Stanley Cup in the future.Also Read: NHL Trade News: Florida Panthers sign MacKenzie Entwistle to two-year, two-way contract
Article Summary: Carolina hurricanes sign nikolaj ehlers to pivotal six-year, $51 million contract. The 29-year-old winger was the most sought-after player remaining on the market. Ehlers' contract has an average value of $8.5 million per year and represents carolina's commitment to bringing scoring punch.

Article Title: Caitlin Clark shocks Pat McAfee with wild beer chug after Indiana Fever clinch Commissioner’s Cup
Article Text:
Caitlin Clar, Image via Getty

Caitlin Clark stuns teammates and Pat McAfee by shotgunning beer after Indiana Fever win

Clark’s unexpected moment catches the eye of fans and even her boyfriend Connor McCaffrey

Fans are talking after a fun video of WNBA rookie Caitlin Clark started going viral this week. It followed the Commissioner's Cup final victory of the Indiana Fever over the Minnesota Lynx on July 2, which broke franchise records. Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis was where the game was played. Though hurt in her groin, Caitlin Clark attended the team celebration following the game. Everyone was talking about her next behavior. A video from inside the locker room showed her doing something many didn’t expect.Caitlin Clark is shown shotgunning a beer together with her teammates in the newly viral video. Posted on Instagram, X, and TikTok, the video soon racked up thousands of views. One responder was Pat McAfee, former NFL punter and current ESPN host.McAfee, who is from Indiana and supports Clark, reposted the video on X with this caption:“Just saw this video of CC shotgunning a beer during her team’s Commissioner’s Cup celebration last night. CHUGGING BEERS WITH THE SQUAD #LEADER #DAWG #GOTTHEFEVER.”Clark’s bold beer moment came just after her team won 74–59 against the defending champs. Even though she didn’t play, her energy stood out.Her teammates cheered her on and showed how close this team is.Clark is known for being focused and intense. But this playful side surprised many. Even her boyfriend, Connor McCaffrey, may not have seen it coming.Fans online loved it. Some said it showed her leadership off the court. Even though she didn't score a point, others referred to it as the "highlight of the night.”The recently appointed captain of the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game was Clark. She told reporters she was proud of her teammates and wanted to soon get back on the court. ESPN and the official WNBA website indicate she is still recuperating from her injury.The Fever are back on court July 4 against A’ja Wilson and the Las Vegas Aces. Clark won’t play that game either. She could return for the game on Saturday, July 6, when they face the Los Angeles Sparks.Also Read: 'There’s a lot of stuff going around'- Bronny James responds to LeBron James’ trade rumours for next seas Until then, fans are enjoying a new side of Caitlin Clark, one that brings fire, fun, and leadership all in one.
Article Summary: Caitlin clark's unexpected moment catches the eye of fans and even her boyfriend connor mccaffrey. It followed the commissioner's cup final victory of the indiana fever over the minnesota lynx on july 2, which broke franchise records. Though hurt in her groin, caitlin clark attended the team celebration following the game.

Article Title: NHL Trade News: Florida Panthers sign MacKenzie Entwistle to two-year, two-way contract
Article Text:
Photo: Todd Reicher

Florida Panthers sign MacKenzie Entwistle to boost forward depth and add physical edge to lineup

MacKenzie Entwistle aims for NHL return after injury challenges and time in the AHL

The Florida Panthers have added organizational depth with the signing of forward MacKenzie Entwistle to a two-year, two-way agreement. The 25-year-old, who spent several seasons in the Chicago Blackhawks system, will attempt a return to form after a 2024-25 season that was shortened by injury. Entwistle offers NHL experience and a physical presence that can be an asset at the bottom of the Florida lineup.MacKenzie Entwistle played 67 games with Chicago in 2023-24 with five goals, 11 points, 47 penalty minutes, and 138 hits. He was plagued by injuries for most of last season, limiting his efforts to seven regular-season contests with AHL's Charlotte Checkers, where he had one goal and two points. In limited play, Entwistle came back for the playoffs and registered two goals and 20 penalty minutes in eight post-season games, proving that he can perform under pressure.The Panthers have been busy adding depth to their forward corps after their deep 2024-25 playoff push. Entwistle's experience and versatility may be useful, particularly in a bottom-six position that requires energy and defensive dependability. Although he is likely to start the season in the AHL, Florida's coaching staff hasn't shut the door on potential NHL call-ups in case of injuries or roster shifts during the season.A third-round draft pick of the Arizona Coyotes in 2017 (69th overall), Entwistle was traded to Chicago as part of the Marian Hossa trade. He fought his way into the Blackhawks' lineup across portions of four seasons, earning respect for his work ethic, penalty killing, and physicality. His finest NHL run occurred in 2023-24, as he emerged as a consistent checking-line forward.The move by Florida to sign a two-year, two-way contract is one of caution and possibility. The two-way deal gives the Panthers flexibility in terms of cap management and roster fluidity while providing Entwistle with an opportunity to prove himself at the NHL level. If he can remain healthy and keep his aggressive style of play going, he might prove to be a solid depth addition to the Florida forwards, who always seem to appreciate grit and energy.Entwistle's signing is as much a reflection of the Panthers' emphasis on creating a strong, durable roster that can handle the rigors of an extended NHL season as anything else. Although he will probably begin the season in the AHL, his skillset and physicality make him a prime candidate to return to the NHL again in the near future.Also Read: Henrik Lundqvist shows how to retire in style with epic waterfront BBQ
Article Summary: Florida panthers sign mackenzie entwistle to boost forward depth and add physical edge to lineup. The 25-year-old, who spent several seasons in the chicago blackhawks system, will attempt a return to form after a 2024-25 season that was shortened by injury. He played 67 games with chicago in 2023-24 with five goals, 11 points, 47 penalty minutes, and 138 hits.

Article Title: Sergei Bobrovsky credits Florida Panthers teammates for historic Stanley Cup win, declines personal praise
Article Text:
Sergei Bobrovsky (via Getty Images)

Sergei Bobrovsky brushes aside personal glory; Florida Panthers system gets praise



This is how much it costs to look like 2x Stanley Cup champ, Sergei Bobrovsky 😲 Which goalie do you

Sergei Bobrovsky was the clear standout in the Florida Panthers’ latest Stanley Cup triumph. Still, when asked about his role in the title run, the veteran goaltender humbly redirected the spotlight. Speaking to Russian outlet MatchTV after clinching back-to-back championships, Bobrovsky downplayed praise from Edmonton Oilers forward Vasily Podkolzin, emphasizing instead the collective effort of his teammates and coaching staff. The Panthers, now chasing a third straight title, are setting their sights on NHL history.Sergei Bobrovsky's .905 save percentage in the pivotal game helped tip the series in the Florida Panthers' favor to win the Stanley Cup, but Sergei Bobrovsky remained true to his well-known modesty.I am just part of the team. Part of the system. All the guys worked to the maximum. The concentration and intensity, especially in these games, were off the charts. When a team plays like that, it makes the goalkeeper’s job easier. The opponent has no time for anything, and in key moments it is very difficult for him to do what he wants," he shared with MatchTV. “I’m excited about the next season, about the next challenge. We have, again, a great group of guys. I’m excited to be their goalie, to help them, to go through the challenges and hurdles with them."The Florida Panthers are now on the brink of NHL greatness. With two titles in two seasons, they can make history and become the first team to win three in a row during the salary cap era. Only the Pittsburgh Penguins and Chicago Blackhawks have won three in total since the salary cap era began, but none have won a legitimate three-peat."We have a great group of guys. We have good players, but next season starts from zero for everybody,” he acknowledged. “If you win [a third cup in a row], it’s going to be happiness."Amidst the NHL's changing landscape, few teams have the depth, chemistry, and leadership Florida has nurtured in recent years. And underpinning it all is Sergei Bobrovsky's immoveable humility and unflappable play, inspiring it all.Also read: Sergei Bobrovsky becomes first goalie in NHL history with back-to-back 40-save games Whether they achieve the unattainable three-peat or come up short, Bobrovsky's team-first approach is already establishing the precedent for another unbelievable go.
Article Summary: Sergei bobrovsky was the clear standout in the florida panthers' latest stanley cup triumph. Still, when asked about his role in the title run, the veteran goaltender humbly redirected the spotlight. The panthers, now chasing a third straight title, are setting their sights on nhl history.

Article Title: “I will give you my absolute best”: John Cena makes a big promise to fans ahead of retirement
Article Text:
John Cena (Image Source: Getty)

WWE legend John Cena makes major promise to fans ahead of his final match

That Grape Juice

John Cena & Priyanka Chopra Light Up 'Heads of State' Premiere | Exclusive Interviews

Also Read

As anticipation builds towards John Cena's final match of his retirement tour in WWE, the 17-time World Champion John Cena has issued a heartfelt pledge to his fans to deliver every ounce of his passion and performance in the upcoming big events of the Stanford-based promotions.The WWE wrestler and actor who was recently seen in the Night of Champions in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, is currently busy with his newly released film, Heads of State, starring John Cena, Priyanka Chopra, and Idris Alba. Apart from his acting career, the WWE legend is juggling with his forthcoming big wrestling events too, which are a part of his farewell tour campaign. Let's take a look at what promise he made to his fans. WWE legend John Cena has made a major promise to his wrestling fans ahead of his final bout in December. With six months remaining before he bids adieu to wrestling, he’s been discussing his run so far and his plans for life after wrestling. During one of the recent premieres, John Cena spoke to, promising fans about giving his all.Appearing on the red carpet for his new film Heads of State , Cena said, “It’s my final time. I’m done in December. I think the one common thread you’ll find in me for 25 years is I will give you my absolute best. So, regardless of what the TV shows dole out and how we try to entertain audiences, I will leave nothing on the cam. I will leave everything on the cam.”Cena announced 2025 as his final year of wrestling and is on a retirement tour, committing to around 36 appearances. He now has 15 dates remaining. He will next appear on the July 18th edition of WWE SmackDown and then will appear for another major premium live event, SummerSlam 2025 Speculations are doing the rounds that Cena might face his arch-rival Cody Rhodes at SummerSlam 2025, who recently was crowned as King of the Ring, at the Night of Champions on June 28 in Riyadh.According to PWMania, “WWE has announced that the current Undisputed WWE Champion, John Cena, will appear on the SmackDown episode airing on July 18th. This episode will take place at the Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, in anticipation of next month’s SummerSlam premium live event.”Fans will get a glimpse of the WWE world champion in his next bout at SmackDown and at the upcoming premium live event of Summerslam 2025, scheduled to be held on August 2 and August 3 in New Jersey.
Article Summary: Wwe legend john cena makes major promise to fans ahead of his final match. Cena announced 2025 as his final year of wrestling and is on a retirement tour, committing to around 36 appearances. He will next appear on the july 18th edition of wwe smackdown and then will appear for another major live event, summerslam 2025.

Article Title: Is Saraya planning to make a comeback at the upcoming WWE Evolution 2?
Article Text:
(Image via WWE)

Saraya drops a hint about her WWE comeback

Saraya talks Hell In Boots Book, Charmed, Horror, and More!!

Grue Rume Show

Also Read:

Veteran wrestler Saraya, a three‑time women’s world champion, recently dropped a major hint about her plans to make a comeback at the upcoming WWE Evolution 2. Rumors are doing the rounds that the WWE legendary figure is making her return at the upcoming premium live event scheduled to be held on July 13, 2025.Saraya happens to be one of the most popular figures of WWE of her time. She is known for winning the WWE Divas title twice, and was the most youthful ever to come out on top for the championship at 21 years old years 233 days old. She was additionally the debut NXT Women's Champion and the first individual ever to hold the two titles simultaneously.Despite dominating and capturing the AEW Women’s World Championship at the All In event in August 2023, Saraya announced a hiatus late in 2024 to pursue personal projects. Let’s take a look at what the WWE star is planning. Former AEW star Saraya has recently dropped a potential hint about her WWE comeback on her social media account. The star who has been out of wrestling for certain personal commitments has finally decided to step up again in the squared ring this time at Evolution 2 on July 13, 2025.Ahead of WWE’s all-women’s PLE, Evolution , on July 13 in Atlanta, Georgia, Saraya asked on X/Twitter if the show was occurring this weekend: “Evolution is this weekend?” Though it appeared innocent, the message quickly set the wrestling world ablaze.Fans wasted no time interpreting the post as a sign that Saraya might be making a major appearance.This has not been confirmed by WWE yet, and fans are speculating that she might make a comeback. Although many fans want to see the Saraya return to the Stamford-based promotion, the former Divas Champion is not confident about it.On the, Saraya shared, “I kind of wanna take 2025 to do acting and all that kind of fun stuff, but one day, I would love to. I mean, Rhea’s amazing. She’s a powerhouse. Everybody there. The women’s roster there right now is stacked, so yeah, it’s incredible, and they’re doing really wonderful things. I don’t know if there’s even a place for me there right now, but… I get that a lot. I’ve got that in other interviews, too. Everyone’s very like, ‘Go home. ’”During the interview, she mentioned that while she was open to a return, she intended to dedicate 2025 to her acting career and other personal ventures. However, the WWE icon also expressed uncertainty about whether she still fits into the current locker room of the Stamford-based promotion or not.
Article Summary: Saraya, a three‑time women’s world champion, recently dropped a major hint about her plans to make a comeback. Rumors are doing the rounds that the wwe legendary figure is making her return at the upcoming premium live event scheduled to be held on july 13, 2025. Saraya announced a hiatus late in 2024 to pursue personal projects.

Article Title: “From meeting at a pool party to officially married”: Former WWE star Jinder Mahal shares moments from his big fat Indian wedding
Article Text:
(Image via X)

Jinder Mahal’s love story with his wife Priya

maang tika

a nath



WWE stars who attended Jinder Mahal’s wedding

Also Read

Former WWE star Jinder Mahal, now known as Raj Dhesi, celebrated his marriage to Priya in June 2025, surrounded by his family, friends, and a few fellow wrestling stars. The wrestling legend achieved a personal milestone by getting married to his long-time girlfriend Priya on June 27, 2025, in a grand wedding celebration. The wrestling star has recently shared the stunning moments from his big fat Indian wedding.No sooner did he share the heart-warming moments from his lavish wedding than congratulatory wishes poured in from his fans and well-wishers. It was a grand wedding celebration, highlighting the beautiful culture of both Punjabi and Gujarati rituals. Let’s take a look at how the couple met and how the wrestlers' love story unfolded. Jinder Mahal, aka Raj Dhesi , has recently tied the knot with his partner Priya in a lavish Indian wedding on June 27. The grand celebration was nothing short of a big fat Indian wedding, filled with vibrant traditions, opulent decor, and joyful festivities.The love story of Mahal with his girlfriend Priya began when they first met at a pool party. The duo instantly connected and dated for a long time until in March 2025, they got engaged. Priya hails from Tampa, Florida, and is a fashion content creator with a growing social media following.Sharing the stunning moments of his lavish Indian wedding, the former WWE star and 3MB member wrote, “From meeting at a pool party to officially married. Y + P 6-27-2025.”In the video, it could be seen that for their special day, Yuvraj and Priya chose to break away from traditional hues. The groom donned a blue sherwani, complemented with a matching turban and footwear.Meanwhile, the bride dazzled in an elegant ivory lehenga featuring intricate embroidery. She completed her look with a stack of bangles, classic gold jewelry including a, and a layered combination of a choker and long necklaces.Raj gave fans a heartfelt glimpse into his journey with Priya. The Canadian professional wrestler shared several stunning images of his grand wedding celebrations on Instagram. From their dreamy pre-wedding shoot and engagement to the fun-filled cocktail night and the grand wedding ceremony.The 38-year-old professional wrestler celebrated his wedding ceremony recently with several WWE celebrities by his side, including Drew McIntyre . McIntyre joined the wedding celebrations with his wife Kaitlyn Frohnapfel. The couple were seen gracing the ceremony in beautiful Indian traditional attire. In addition to this, Heath Slater of 3MB fame also joined the wedding celebrations.Drew McIntyre and his wife, Kaitlyn Frohnapfel, attended the ceremony in traditional Indian attire. The WWE star looked dashing in a green sherwani and Sikh turban for Mahal’s wedding. While his wife, Kaitlyn Frohnapfel, was seen donning a beautiful purple lehenga and a blue traditional saree, accessorised with Indian jewelry.The wedding also marked a reunion of the three 3MB members. Jinder Mahal also took to his Instagram handle to share a picture of their reunion at his wedding. The former WWE star posted their picture with a caption, “3 Man Barat!” In the same post, the three wrestling legends were seen in Indian traditional attire.
Article Summary: Jinder mahal, aka raj dhesi, tied the knot with his partner priya in a lavish indian wedding on june 27. The 38-year-old professional wrestler celebrated his wedding ceremony with several wwe celebrities by his side. Drew mcintyre and his wife, kaitlyn frohnapfel, attended the ceremony in traditional indian attire.

Article Title: Travis Hunter’s wife Leanna Lenee gives fans inside look at their honeymoon in Turks and Caicos
Article Text:
Travis Hunter’s wife Leanna Lenee gives fans inside look at their $20K honeymoon villa in Turks and Caicos.

Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee just soft-launched their honeymoon villa and it’s a whole vibe

Leanna and Travis are building a lifestyle brand, one vlog at a time



Travis Hunter & Leanna Reveal Their Bridesmaids and Groomsmen (Wedding Series EP. 1)

Forget a soft launch, Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee just went full tropical flex mode with their brand-new honeymoon vlog from Turks and Caicos, and it’s exactly what you’d expect from a couple living their best NFL rookie dream life. The newlyweds dropped a $20K+ vlog that looks like a Netflix original with ocean views, private villas, and serious luxury energy.And while fans were expecting a full travel documentary, what they got was even more relatable: a glam glimpse of what real luxury looks like, through Leanna’s eyes.The vlog opens with the couple boarding their flight, think matching travel fits and excited honeymoon energy before cutting to scenic arrival shots and a walkthrough of their stunning beachfront villa in Turks and Caicos.The star of the vlog? The villa itself. Leanna takes fans on a full room-by-room tour, showing off the private pool, lush decor, balcony views, and all the tropical opulence that $20K buys you on a honeymoon.No over-the-top acting. No scripted drama. Just two newlyweds soaking it all in with an aesthetic filter, of course.While Travis Hunter may be a rookie star for the Jacksonville Jaguars, and Leanna is often the subject of viral headlines (some sweet, some messy), their vlogs are shifting the narrative.Together, they're building a lifestyle brand that merges football fame with content creator realness.Their YouTube channel, Travis and Leanna, has evolved from pre-wedding videos to high-end travel content, and this vlog feels like their most polished production yet. It’s all part of their vibe, young love, luxury, and a little bit of real life in the mix. Some are loving Leanna’s role as the narrator and tour guide of the trip, while others are pointing out how real the video feels not over-edited, not too flashy, just high-budget vibes with personal energy.From a Super Bowl-level proposal vibe to now a full-on luxury honeymoon vlog, Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee are definitely giving main-character energy. And while NFL fans are keeping an eye on Hunter’s rookie season in Jacksonville, there’s a growing audience who’s just here for the lifestyle content.Also read - “Confirm he’s the father”: Puka Nacua’s pregnant girlfriend files for custody, paternity, and pregnancy costs
Article Summary: Travis hunter’s wife leanna lenee gives fans inside look at their $20k honeymoon villa in turks and caicos. Leanna takes fans on a full room-by-room tour, showing off the private pool, lush decor, balcony views.

Article Title: Kay Adams impresses fans with surprise first pitch at Wrigley Field
Article Text:
Kay Adams (via Getty Images)

Chicago's own Kay Adams comes home to toss first pitch at Cubs game



Kay Adams adds football flair to the baseball diamond



A flawless pitch and a hometown moment



NFL hostess Kay Adams might be recognized for her football analysis, but this week she stole the show in an entirely new domain. The Chicagoan surprised fans by stepping onto the mound at Wrigley Field, tossing the ceremonial first pitch before a Chicago Cubs game—and doing it in style.During the NFL offseason, the 39-year-old took a break to get in touch with her heritage, appearing at Wrigley Field to toss the first pitch for the Chicago Cubs.Wearing a vintage Cubs jersey and jeans, Kay Adams walked onto the field with her hallmark spirit. She even have a sweet hug to the mascot, Clark the Cub. The crowd was surprised—and amazed—as she unapologetically threw the pitch down the plate, prompting the fans to cheer her on. Her appearance was a pleasant surprise for many at the game, particularly those who watch her contributions in NFL media.While her pitch was a short moment, the effect was lasting. Cameras recorded Kay Adams laughing broadly as she walked back into the dugout after her pitch. Although some social media remarks jokingly said she was "immediately pulled" after her inaugural pitch, it was all in the ceremonial spirit.As the host of ‘Up & Adams,’ Kay Adams has established a devoted following due to her extensive NFL analysis and energetic on-air personality. Her affinity for sports extends beyond the NFL, however. Raised in Chicago, she grew up a fan of all home teams—including the Cubs.While Tuesday witnessed her not being in her show, Adams had a return to remember Wednesday, but not in the studio, on one of baseball's hallowed grounds. The experience came across as a personal one for Adams, fusing her public identity with her hometown spirit.Also read: Aaron Rodgers blasts ‘sick society,’ says fans will never see his wife—vows to vanish after final NFL season Whether reporting on NFL news or appearing at Wrigley for a ceremonial pitch, Kay Adams is still demonstrating she's a jack-of-all-trades and fan favorite within the sporting world. For Cubs fans and NFL supporters, her short but thrilling moment on the mound was a pleasant surprise—one that showcased her continued commitment to the city that built her.
Article Summary: Nfl hostess kay adams threw the ceremonial first pitch at a chicago cubs game. The 39-year-old is known for her extensive nfl analysis and energetic on-air personality. Raised in chicago, she grew up a fan of all home teams, including the cubs.

Article Title: NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal joins Demi Moore, Deepika Padukone, and others as star on Hollywood Walk of Fame
Article Text:
NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal announced a star on Hollywood Walk of Fame (Image Credit: Getty Images)

Shaquille O’Neal bagged star on Hollywood Walk of Fame in sports entertainment category

Walk of Fame - Class of 2026 Announcement

Exploring Shaquille O’Neal’s contribution to TV and OTT entertainment

What is common among Shaquille O’Neal, Demi Moore, Emily Blunt, and Deepika Padukone? Well, it is a prestigious recognition of being a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, class of 2026.The Naismith Basketball Hall of Famer has been announced as a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. He joins the elite class alongside Timothée Chalamet, Demi Moore, Deepika Padukone, Emily Blunt, and others.The 7’1” basketball giant has done a fair share of work in films, TV, and OTT. His strong personality and screen presence earned him roles in the silver screen and TV projects at his prime. The NBA legend has been a bona fide entertainer with a long list of films, TV drama shows, guest appearances, and OTT docuseries in his filmography. His sports analysis show, Inside the NBA, recently ended its 35-year run at TNT.The stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame were announced by HCC President and CEO Steve Nissen and Walk of Famers Eugenio Derbez and Richard Blade on July 2. Among the various names adorning the Walk of Fame is the basketball legend, Shaquille O’Neal.He is the only honoree to have been inducted into the prestigious Walk in the sports entertainment category.The NBA legend has a vast presence that extends beyond basketball.Other notable figures included in the Hollywood Walk of Fame Class of 2026 are Sarah Michelle Gellar, Rami Malek, Bradley Whitford, Noah Wyle, Keith David, Molly Ringwald, Rachel McAdams, and Marion Cotillard.He is known for his pivotal role in the 1996 film Kazaam, where he played the role of a magical entity. In 1997, he appeared in another film, Steel, as a weapons expert. He also delivered comedic performances in Grown Ups 2 and Uncle Drew. Apart from these, Shaquille has played himself in various films and made guest appearances.Shaquille’s career in entertainment is not restricted to films only. He is a well-known TV personality as well. An ESPN series, Shaquille (2005), was based entirely on his life on and off the court. After retirement in 2011, he became an important part of the experts panel on TNT’s Inside the NBA show.His other TV projects include guest appearances in shows like The Parkers, The Suite Life of Zack & Cody, Entourage, and The Cleveland Show etc.Some of his famous documentaries and docuseries include HBO’s SHAQ and Netflix’s Power Moves. These projects affirm his vast presence beyond basketball.Shaquille proved his excellence in both the comedy and drama genres. His work in the field of cinema and TV extends behind the camera as well. He owns a production company, Jersey Legends Productions. Under this banner, Shaquille teamed with Stephen Curry and Erick Peyton as executive producers for a short film, Queen of Basketball. The short film won the 2022 Oscar in the short subject documentary category.Also Read: Shaquille O’Neal and Allen Iverson bring Reebok’s comeback to life in new Netflix sports series
Article Summary: Nba legend shaquille o’neal announced a star on hollywood walk of fame. He joins the elite class alongside timothée chalamet, demi moore, deepika padukone, emily blunt, and others. The 7’1” basketball giant has done a fair share of work in films, tv, and ott.

Article Title: Aaron Rodgers blasts ‘sick society,’ says fans will never see his wife — vows to vanish after final NFL season
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers sounds off on his wife wanting private life (Getty Images)

Aaron Rodgers says this NFL season is his last and he's ‘out’ for good afterward

"I'm Pretty Sure This Is It.." Aaron Rodgers Plans To Retire After 1 Year Deal With Steelers

Mystery wife Brittani wants zero fame—and Rodgers is just fine with that

Aaron Rodgers Praises Steelers Leadership & Talent, Gives Life Updates On The Pat McAfee Show

Aaron Rodgers is stepping into his final NFL season—and he’s already planning his total disappearance from the spotlight. In a brutally honest appearance on The Pat McAfee Show, the 41-year-old quarterback confirmed what fans had long suspected: the 2025 season with the Pittsburgh Steelers will be his last. But it’s not just football he’s leaving behind—Rodgers says he’s retreating from public life completely, along with his wife, Brittani.“I’m pretty sure this is it,” Aaron Rodgers said bluntly about his one-year deal with the Steelers. “That’s why we just did a one-year deal. Steelers didn’t need to put any extra years on it.”While Rodgers promised to give Pittsburgh “everything I got,” he also made it clear he’s done chasing headlines. “When this is all done, I’m out; you won’t see me,” he said. “I don’t want to live a public life.”Rodgers’ clarity about walking away from fame underscores a deeper personal shift—one that includes his fiercely private marriage to Brittani.Rodgers spent much of the interview defending his wife's desire for privacy and slamming what he called a “sick society.” “Now I’m with somebody who’s private, who doesn’t want to be in the public eye,” he explained.“Didn’t sign up to be a celebrity, doesn’t want to be part of it.”The quarterback expressed frustration over paparazzi stalking his new life in Pittsburgh, including trying to photograph Brittani and even his dog, Apollo. “It’s a sick society, isn’t it?” he said.Despite being in the public eye for two decades, Rodgers says he's ready to cut the cord completely. “Just because I’m not selling wedding photos to the magazines... that’s just not what I want to do,” he said. He also warned fans not to expect family members to leak info either. “Any other ridiculous story about my family that I don’t talk to—they wouldn’t know any information about me,” he added.Also Read: “She made me better”: Patrick Mahomes says the woman everyone loves to hate, Brittany Mahomes—is the real reason behind his NFL greatness As Rodgers prepares to close the chapter on his NFL career, one thing is certain: when the final whistle blows, he won’t just be leaving the field—he’ll be vanishing from public view entirely.
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers says this nfl season is his last and he's ‘out’ for good afterward. The 41-year-old quarterback confirmed what fans had long suspected: the 2025 season with the pittsburgh steelers will be his last. “when this is all done, i’m out; you won’t see me,” he said.

Article Title: India vs England 2nd Test: Elite company! Yashasvi Jaiswal enters club featuring Don Bradman, Viv Richards
Article Text: Yashasvi Jaiswal made history in the second Test against England. He became the first Indian to score fifty-plus runs in seven consecutive Tests against England at the start of his career. Jaiswal also joined an elite group of batters with 900+ runs in their first seven Tests against England. He scored 87 runs. Shubman Gill remained unbeaten with 114 runs.
Article Summary: Yashasvi jaiswal made history in the second test against england. He became the first indian to score fifty-plus runs in seven consecutive tests against england at the start of his career. He scored 87 runs. Shubman gill remained unbeaten with 114 runs.
